HOME.title: Alara-Lukagro (En)
HOME.text: Alara-Lukagro has a wide range of products that reduce noise, it is sometimes difficult for customers to know which product they need. So to make it easier for Alara-Lukagro's customers now, Alara-Lukagro came up with the idea of designing an application in which Alara-Lukagro's customers can use a sound recording to see how much decibel sound there is and how much reduction can be achieved with the help of Alara-Lukagro products.
